title: 装了个生长矿石就崩了
author: tonyxu11
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Would you like a cupcake?
Time: 13-2-18 下午5:16
Description: Failed to start game
java.lang.RuntimeException: Couldn't load config! Was looking for: E:\所有minecraft\实验\minecraft\.minecraft/bin/shader/config.txt
 at Water_Config.<init>(Water_Config.java:80)
 at ban.<init>(EntityRenderer.java:203)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:422)
 at asq.a(SourceFile:56)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:744)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- System Details --
Details:
 Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
 Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
 Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
 Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
 Memory: 303880992 bytes (289 MB) / 510066688 bytes (486 MB) up to 1046937600 bytes (998 MB)
 JVM Flags: 3 total; -Xincgc -Xms512m -Xmx1024m
 AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
 Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed
 IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
 FML: MCP v7.26 FML v4.7.4.520 Minecraft Forge 6.6.0.497 4 mods loaded, 4 mods active
 mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized
 FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized
 Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized
 mod_GrowableOres [mod_GrowableOres] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized
 LWJGL: 2.4.2
 OpenGL: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5430 GL version 4.0.10061 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.
 Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'forge,fml'
 Type: Client (map_client.txt)
 Texture Pack: Default
 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
 Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null




刚装了个forge，接着又往minecraft.jar里扔了个生长矿石，开游戏就这样了
这里是那个生长矿石的链接http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=89580&highlight=%BF%F3%CA%AF

replies.txt_content:
LZ,生长矿石MOD要放到MODS里面哦~
如果有效，请设置最佳答案.

replies.author: tonyxu11
replies.txt_content:
fyfly 发表于 2013-2-18 17:28 
这好像跟水反有关系
正解，装水反也有这毛病，但是这个我没装也冒出来了……
